description: Detects installation of new shim databases that try to patch sections of known processes for potential process injection or persistence.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: Suspicious Shim Database Patching Activity
query: (winlog.event_data.TargetObject:/.*\\[Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt][Ww][Aa][Rr][Ee]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\ [Nn][Tt]\\[Cc][Uu][Rr][Rr][Ee][Nn][Tt][Vv][Ee][Rr][Ss][Ii][Oo][Nn]\\[Aa][Pp][Pp][Cc][Oo][Mm][Pp][Aa][Tt][Ff][Ll][Aa][Gg][Ss]\\[Cc][Uu][Ss][Tt][Oo][Mm]\\.*/ AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:(/.*\\[Cc][Ss][Rr][Ss][Ss]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Dd][Ll][Ll][Hh][Oo][Ss][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ee][Xx][Pp][Ll][Oo][Rr][Ee][Rr]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ss][Ee][Rr][Vv][Ii][Cc][Ee][Ss]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ss][Vv][Cc][Hh][Oo][Ss][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Tt][Aa][Ss][Kk][Hh][Oo][Ss][Tt][Ww]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Ll][Oo][Gg][Oo][Nn]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/))
